All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AwsCredentialsConfig
Configuration class for setting up AWS credentials.
CommentController
Controller responsible for handling comment-related operations on posts.
CommentDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a comment.
CommentEntity
Represents a comment entity in the DynamoDB table.
CommentEntryDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a comment entry, which includes both the comment and the user who made the comment.
CommentMapper
Mapper interface for mapping between CommentDto and CommentEntity.
CommentRepository
Repository for managing comment entities in DynamoDB.
CommentService
Service for managing comments on posts.
DailyPostEntity
Represents a daily post entity in the DynamoDB table.
DailyPostRepository
Repository for managing daily post entities in DynamoDB.
DevSecurityConfig
Security configuration for the development environment.
DynamoDBConfig
Configuration class for setting up DynamoDB client and tables.
FriendEntity
Represents a friend relationship entity in the DynamoDB table.
FriendshipEvent
Represents an event that indicates a change in the friendship status between two users.
LikeEntity
Represents a like relationship for a post in the DynamoDB table.
PinnedPostController
Controller responsible for handling pinned post-related operations.
PinnedPostEntity
Represents a pinned post relationship in the DynamoDB table.
PinnedPostRepository
Repository for managing pinned post entities in DynamoDB.
PostController
Controller responsible for handling post-related operations.
PostDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a post, including details such as title, content, like count, comment count, and whether the post is liked or pinned by the user.
PostEntity
Represents a post entity in the DynamoDB table.
PostMapper
Mapper interface for mapping between PostDto and PostEntity.
PostRepository
Repository for managing post and like entities in DynamoDB.
PostService
Service layer responsible for handling business logic related to posts.
PostServiceApplication
 
SecurityConfiguration
Security configuration class that configures HTTP security for the application.
SqsConfig
Configuration class for setting up the Amazon Simple Queue Service (SQS) client.
TimelineController
Controller responsible for handling timeline-related operations.
TimelineEntryDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a timeline entry, which includes a post and the user associated with it.
TimelineService
Service layer responsible for handling timeline-related business logic.
TimeToLiveHelper
 
UserDataEvent
Represents an event that carries user data, typically when a user's information is created or updated.
UserDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a user, containing the user's basic details such as their ID, email, name, and profile picture.
UserEntity
Represents a user entity in the DynamoDB table.
UserEventConsumer
Service responsible for consuming user-related events from an SQS queue and processing them.
UserMapper
Mapper interface for mapping between UserDto, UserEntity, FriendEntity, UserDataEvent, and FriendshipEvent.
UserRepository
Repository for managing user and friend entities in DynamoDB.
UserService
Service layer responsible for handling user-related business logic.
WebConfig
Web configuration class that configures Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) settings for the application.
